thread.title: Soaring agave prices threaten tequila industry

title: Soaring agave prices threaten tequila industry
text:
Soaring agave prices threaten tequila industry Wednesday, January 31, 2018 - 01:40 
In the heartland of the tequila industry, in Mexico’s western state of Jalisco, a worsening shortage of agave caused by mounting demand for the liquor from New York to Tokyo has many producers worried.   
In the heartland of the tequila industry, in Mexico’s western state of Jalisco, a worsening shortage of agave caused by mounting demand for the liquor from New York to Tokyo has many producers worried.  //reut.rs/2E4arhW
